biography: Peter LaCroix was born in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. He is an actor, known for Free Willy 3: The Rescue (1997), They (2002) and Noroc (1999). He made guest appearances on all three of the longest running North American science fiction series: The X-Files (1993), Stargate SG-1 (1997) and Smallville (2001).
name: Peter LaCroix
